snippet: Guised as Josiah and Dusty Bindle, two entrepreneurs offer “artisanal bindles” to the Williamsburg crowd.
abstract: Bindle Brothers, Brooklyn-based entrepreneurial team selling artisanal version of the bindle bag once carried by hobos, turns out to be satiric invention of comedy writer Kemp Baldwin, who created characters and product to mock contemporary hipster fashion.
lead_paragraph: Guised as Josiah and Dusty Bindle, two entrepreneurs offer “artisanal bindles” to the Williamsburg crowd.

headline.main: Hobo Chic From the Bindle Bros. of Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Hobo Chic From the Bindle Bros. of Brooklyn
